title: Designing & Branding
details: A creative graphic designer who can design logo, poster, flyer, business card, and banner design.  I bring your brand to life with bright, professional, and eye-catching images.

title: Photoshop Editing
details: Beginner Photoshop user learns picture editing, color correction, and basic retouching techniques.  I'm passionate about producing clean, vivid visuals and always improve my skills with each project.
